        protected static int getLastId(java.lang.String table,
            DataConnection dc)
                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves the last invoice number. Invoice numbers must follow (without intervall). An invoice number is composed of year on 2 digits, month on 2 digits and an incremental integer yymmN...
        Parameters:
        dc -
        Returns:
        une chaîne de caractères correspondant au numéro de facture
